thought: The workflow has been fully implemented and tested. It reads data from Google Sheets, calculates profit, classifies each entry using AI, sends Slack messages, generates reminder emails for 'to Customer' entries using a second AI, and sends emails via Gmail. All steps run successfully as verified by the outputs.
plan: Submit the completed task as the workflow meets all user requirements.
No further changes needed since the workflow is working correctly.
criticism: None, the workflow is complete and functioning as expected.

tool_input.result: The workflow is implemented as per user requirements and successfully tested end-to-end. It triggers manually, reads Google Sheets data, classifies descriptions with AI, sends Slack messages, generates reminder emails for 'to Customer' entries, and sends them via Gmail.
